metadata.title: Frontend Project Setup with Vite, React, TypeScript

story.iWant: a modern React frontend with instant HMR and TypeScript safety
story.soThat: I can build the UI quickly with fast feedback loops
story.tasks:
- Task 1: Initialize Vite + React + TypeScript project - Run `npm create vite@latest frontend -- --template react-ts` - Verify directory structure matches requirements - Test `npm run dev` starts development server - Test `npm run build` creates production assets
- Task 2: Configure Tailwind CSS 4.0 - Install Tailwind CSS: `npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/vite` - Create `tailwind.config.js` with Oceanic Calm theme colors - Add Tailwind directives to `src/styles/globals.css` - Configure Vite plugin in `vite.config.ts` - Test Tailwind utilities work in components
- Task 3: Configure path aliases and TypeScript - Add `@/` path alias to `vite.config.ts` mapping to `src/` - Update `tsconfig.json` with path mapping - Configure strict TypeScript checks - Test imports work with `@/` prefix - Verify real-time error reporting in dev mode
- Task 4: Set up Vitest for unit testing - Install Vitest: `npm install -D vitest @testing-library/react @testing-library/jest-dom` - Create `vitest.config.ts` - Add test script to `package.json` - Create sample test for App component - Verify tests run with `npm test`
- Task 5: Create project structure and baseline components - Create directory structure: `components/`, `hooks/`, `context/`, `lib/`, `styles/` - Create `src/types.ts` for shared TypeScript interfaces - Create `src/App.tsx` with basic layout - Create `src/main.tsx` as React entry point - Create `src/styles/globals.css` with Tailwind directives
- Task 6: Verify backend can serve built assets - Run `npm run build` to create production bundle - Verify `frontend/dist/` directory created - Document Express static file serving configuration needed - Test that built assets are servable (manual verification or mock Express server)

story-context.acceptanceCriteria:
1. **Given** the frontend directory structure exists: ``` frontend/ ├── src/ │ ├── main.tsx # React entry point │ ├── App.tsx # Root component │ ├── components/ │ ├── hooks/ │ ├── context/ │ └── types.ts ├── index.html ├── package.json ├── vite.config.ts ├── tailwind.config.js └── tsconfig.json ``` **When** `npm run dev` is executed in the frontend directory **Then** Vite dev server starts with instant HMR
2. **When** code changes are made **Then** TypeScript compilation errors are shown in real-time
3. **When** `npm run build` is executed **Then** optimized production assets are created in `frontend/dist/`
4. **When** production build completes **Then** the build output includes: - `index.html` with hashed asset references - JavaScript bundles with code splitting - CSS bundle with Tailwind utilities
5. **When** backend Express server is configured **Then** the backend can serve these static assets from `frontend/dist/`
